# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've stayed true to my principles while adapting strategically. I built genuine connections with many of you, honored my alliances when possible, and made difficult decisions transparently. 

I never targeted anyone without strategic reason, and I've respected everyone's gameplay. When forced to make tough choices, I did so based on game dynamics rather than personal vendettas.

I believe I've played a balanced game of social awareness, strategic thinking, and authentic relationship-building. I'd be honored to have your vote as someone who played with both heart and mind.
